amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 116-61 to add that the Secretary shall implement outreach and educational activities in areas with high health disparities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
